nodes.text: The Bothawui Defense Corps was a Bothan planetary defense unit which performed peacekeeping and intelligence operations. During the Clone Wars, Arkhan Brem'tu was a Lieutenant in the Corps and conducted several operations on Bothawui. He observed the rise of Emperor Palpatine and later helped create Rebel cells.
The Bothawui Defense Corps was mentioned in Arkhan Brem'tu's Character Folio included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
